body_content.explanation: (an) illness of people, animals, plants, etc., caused by infection or a failure of health rather than by an accident:
examples: They reported a sudden outbreak of the disease in the south of the country.
The first symptom of the disease is a very high temperature.
She has caught/contracted (= begun to have) a lung disease/disease of the lungs.
Starvation and disease have killed thousands of refugees.

body_content.explanation: something that is considered very bad in people or society:
examples: The real disease affecting the country is inflation.
